titleStmt.title: Directions for seeker & expectants, or, A guide for weak Christians in these distracted times wherein the language of Sions-builders is confounded : as it was delivered in a sermon at Wickham-Market ... published at the earnest entreatie of many, for a more publique good / by Zeph. Smith, Minister of Wickham-Market in Suffolke.
titleStmt.author: Smyth, Zeph. (Zephaniah), fl. 1646-1648.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Matthew Simmons for John Sweeting ...,

notesStmt.note: Running title: Directions for seekers and weake Christians.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
